comments.raw_text: This test still fails when running with fission-enabled.
comments.author: dlee@mozilla.com
comments.text: This test still fails when running with fission-enabled.
comments.creator: dlee@mozilla.com

comments.raw_text:
In the patch, we first fix the test for using the correct principal to
do the test. And we make this test Fission-Compatible by checking the
storage permission in the parent process for Fission.
comments.creator: tihuang@mozilla.com
comments.author: tihuang@mozilla.com
comments.text:
Created attachment 9150424
Bug 1639149 - Fix and make the test 'browser_permissionInNormalWindows.js' Fission-compatible. r?baku!


In the patch, we first fix the test for using the correct principal to
do the test. And we make this test Fission-Compatible by checking the
storage permission in the parent process for Fission.
